Container.Name: fleet
Container.Overview: Fleet(https://github.com/linuxserver/fleet) provides an online web interface which displays a set of maintained images from one or more owned repositories.
Container.Changes:
### 2021-12-13 - Add mitigations for CVE-2021-44228
### 2020-04-26 - Updated to keep in line with v2.0.0 branch of Fleet
### 2019-12-19 - Rebasing to alpine 3.11.
### 2019-07-02 - Rebasing to alpine 3.10.
### 2019-07-02 - Stop container if fleet fails.
### 2019-05-19 - Use new base images for arm versions.
### 2019-04-01 - Initial Release

Config.Name: Appdata
Config.Description: The primary config file and rolling log files.

Config.Name: fleet_admin_authentication_type
Config.Description: A switch to define how Fleet manages user logins. If set to DATABASE, see the related optional params. Can be set to either DATABASE or PROPERTIES.

Config.Name: fleet_database_url
Config.Description: The full JDBC connection string to the Fleet database

Config.Name: fleet_database_username
Config.Description: The username with the relevant GRANT permissions for the database

Config.Name: fleet_admin_secret
Config.Description: A string used as part of the password key derivation process.
